tool_description: This  API uses the same state of the art, deep learning model as Google Translate. It supports 5 languages: be en pl ru uk.
name: Slavic Translation
title: Slavic Translation

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description:
Translate endpoint

Model was optimized for Belarusian for which it achives 96% quality of Google Translate in terms of relative BLEU scores.
| direction | Google  | This_model | delta | quality |
be2en	31,2	28,2	-3,0	90,4%
be2pl	16,2	14,5	-1,7	89,5%
be2ru	21,7	23,0	  1,3 	106,0%
be2uk	17,5	17,7	  0,2 	101,1%
en2be	22,3	20,5	-1,8	91,9%
pl2be	14,9	13,7	-1,2	91,9%
ru2be	21,6	21,1	-0,5	97,7%
uk2be	17,5	17,7	  0,2 	101,1%
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://slavic-translation.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slavic-translation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://slavic-translation.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slavic-translation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
